events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the Software Engineer position.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage communication with the Software Engineer candidate.
Conducted an initial screening of the candidate's technical skills and background in software development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding with the software engineering interview.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate to evaluate coding and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance in coding and system design.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
HR interview was completed successfully and the candidate showed a good fit with company values.
An official offer for the Software Engineer position has been proposed to the candidate outlining compensation and role details.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and asked a few questions about the onboarding process.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their enthusiasm to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has commenced, including access setup and orientation scheduling.
The hiring process is successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
